alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nocatee to 6 miles east of Picolata. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Durbin, Vilano Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Saint Augustine South and Guana River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
